div.p: foo must have a rel attribute
This link does not have a required rel attribute.
All Atom link elements must have a rel attribute that describes the type of link. These are the possible values:

rel="alternate" (if you don't know which one you want, you probably want this one)
rel="start"
rel="prev"
rel="next"
rel="service.feed"
rel="service.edit"
rel="service.post"
